title: Is Sri Lanka’s Eelaam Project shaping into a Reality?
content: – by Shenali D Waduge  – A question on everyone’s mind is whether TNA would be able to achieve what Prabakaran could not and why the Government that stopped Prabakaran would allow an Eelam to emerge under its defacto political party the TNA? The answer to that question is not as easy to conclude which…
